Shape-Link
==========

|PyPI Version| |Tests| |Coverage Status|


Write your own plug-in for real-time data processing with Shape-In.


Installation
------------
Install with pip:
::

    pip install shapelink



Testing
-------
Running tests

::

    python setup.py test
